subject: Urgent: Project Update Meeting
body: Hi Team, we need to meet tomorrow at 10 AM to discuss the Q4 roadmap. Please prepare your status reports.

subject: This Week in AI: Agents are taking over
body: Top stories: 1. New Gemini model released. 2. Python 4.0 rumors. 3. How to build an agent in 5 minutes.

subject: Open Enrollment for Benefits
body: It's that time of year again. Please log in to the portal and select your health plans by Friday.

subject: You won a cruise!
body: Click here to claim your free cruise to the Bahamas. Limited time offer!

subject: Feedback on the new dashboard
body: The new vessel tracking dashboard looks great, but we found a bug in the map view. Can you fix it by EOD?

subject: New job opportunity
body: I saw your profile and thought you'd be a great fit for this Senior AI Engineer role.

subject: Code Review Request
body: Can someone review my PR #123? It blocks the release.

subject: Invoice for October
body: Your invoice for October is ready. Amount: $150.00. Due date: Nov 30.

subject: Python User Group Meetup
body: Join us this Thursday for a talk on FastAPI and AsyncIO.

subject: Security Alert: Suspicious Login
body: We detected a login from a new device. If this wasn't you, please change your password immediately.
